data.text: @ros_hutchinson @kevinhollinrake Use one of the seized oligarchs yachts? Oh…….ask the French or Germans then 🥴

@ros_hutchinson @kevinhollinrake The Tories really are obscene! They lie, they gaslight, the couldn’t care less what they are doing to this country, as long as they are in charge & make money for themselves. We are a laughing stock now, across the world. Johnson & the #Konseяvativ have done this. I despair.
@ros_hutchinson @kevinhollinrake Coved is a hoax the war in the Ukrainian is not black and white and as much as I dislike the Tory's there better then labour I stopped voting when the BNP collapsed
